Instruction1: Although we have multiple precautions in place, it is possible that the system occasionally generates incorrect or misleading information and produces erroneous content. No advice is intended.
Instruction2: Conversations may be reviewed by our AI team to improve our system. Therefore, please do not share sensitive information in your conversations.
Instruction3: Our bot is optimized to engage in dialogue. Let us know if a particular answer was good or bad by clicking on the like or dislike buttons. If you have any comments to help us, write to us!
